description.value:
[Slotless]

Cost: 6 Fame

Prerequisites: Tier 3 with any faction, @Compendium[world.pathfinder-society-boons.1VWMLe12ZFqF9jah]{Expert Hireling}

Effect: When you gain this boon, select one @Compendium[world.pathfinder-society-boons.1VWMLe12ZFqF9jah]{Hireling} boon you possess. The selected ally adds a second Lore skill to the list of skill checks they can attempt. In addition, select one skill feat whose prerequisite is being trained in one of the hirelingâ€™s selected skills. The @Compendium[world.pathfinder-society-boons.1VWMLe12ZFqF9jah]{hireling} gains the benefits of that skill feat when attempting skill checks.

Special: You can purchase this boon multiple times. Each time you purchase this boon, you must apply its benefits to a different @Compendium[world.pathfinder-society-boons.1VWMLe12ZFqF9jah]{Hireling} boon.
